name: AMERICA'S HEALTH INSURANCE PLANS OBO COALITION AGAINST SURPRISE MEDICAL BILLING
description: trade association on behalf of coalition
sampleDescriptions: Legislative and regulatory issues related to surprise medical bills: S. 1895, the Lower Health Care Cost Act; S. 1531, Stopping The Outrageous Practice of Surprise Medical Bills Act of 2019; H.R. 3630, To amend title XXVII of the Public Health Service Act to protect health care consumers from surprise billing practices, and for other purposes; H.R. 3502, Protecting People From Surprise Medical Bills Act; Executive Order on Improving Price and Quality Transparency in American Healthcare to Put Patients First, published June 24, 2019.
